lead_paragraph: At least 13 other people are missing in floods that have ravaged the mountain districts of six provinces and regions in central and southeastern China.

headline.print_headline: China: Death Toll From Flooding Rises to at Least 57
headline.main: China: Death Toll From Flooding Rises to at Least 57

snippet: At least 13 other people are missing in floods that have ravaged the mountain districts of six provinces and regions in central and southeastern China.
